creator: innercity_trendy@hotmail.com
text:
Whenever I open 'start apache in console' from the start menu, an alert pops up 
and says 'Apache has caused an error in LIBHTTPD.DLL. Apache will now close.' I 
can't fix it, and I don't know what to do... but as far as I could see, 
LIBHTTPD.DLL doesn't work in MS DOS...

Ok, I'd guess this is a dupe of Bug 16288. There's a small bug on Win9x/ME in
2.0.44. Did you apply the patch available on <http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi>?
creator: nd@perlig.de

text:
I'm not so good at this. Anyway, thanks for the link. I shall download the 
patch.
creator: innercity_trendy@hotmail.com
slive@apache.org
text:
Looks like this was a dupe.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16288 ***
